description: Federal Reserve chairman Ben Bernanke made his semi-annual testimony on Capitol Hill today. He told lawmakers that Fed tapering of economic stimulus is not "pre-ordained."
title: Federal Reserve stimulus: Preview and post-view
teaser: Federal Reserve chairman Ben Bernanke made his semi-annual testimony on Capitol Hill today. He told lawmakers that Fed tapering of economic stimulus is not "pre-ordained."
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, July 17, 2013
contentencoded:
Federal Reserve chairman Ben Bernanke made his semi-annual testimony on Capitol Hill today. He told lawmakers that Fed tapering of economic stimulus is not "pre-ordained."

Gus Faucher, senior economist at PNC Financial, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.
